bibl.title: Some Aspects of the Archaeology of the Theban Necropolis in the Ptolemaic and Roman Periods.
bibl.note: 1. Preliminaries. - 2. An overview of the data from the Graeco-Roman period [pp. 179-180: The choachite archives]. - 3. Comments on specific issues. - 4. Conclusion. - Bibliography.

bibl.title: The Theban Necropolis, Past, Present and Future

bibl.seg: STRUDWICK Nigel, Some Aspects of the Archaeology of the Theban Necropolis in the Ptolemaic and Roman Periods.
Nigel STRUDWICK and John H. TAYLOR (Edd.), The Theban Necropolis, Past, Present and Future (London, 2003) pp. 167-188, 9 cartes et plans et pll. coul. 93-97.
1. Preliminaries. - 2. An overview of the data from the Graeco-Roman period [pp. 179-180: The choachite archives]. - 3. Comments on specific issues. - 4. Conclusion. - Bibliography.
